item.title: Trump admin live updates: Intel officials testify amid Yemen chat fallout
item.description: Amid scrutiny over the Trump admin's use of an unsecured message chain, some officials are slated to appear before lawmakers for a previously schedule...

item.title: WATCH: Loose cattle tie up traffic on Texas highway
item.description: A herd of loose livestock caused quite a traffic delay when they ran through vehicles along Interstate 45 on Monday.

item.title: Consumer attitudes worsen more than expected amid Trump's tariffs: Survey
item.description: Survey of shopper woes comes days before the onset of additional U.S. tariffs.

item.title: Tesla sales fall by 49% in Europe even as the electric vehicle market grows
item.description: European sales of Tesla electric vehicles tumbled 49% in the first two months of the year even as overall sales of EVs grew

item.title: Messages with Yemen war plans shared with reporter appears 'authentic': Official
item.description: Members of the Trump administration coordinated highly sensitive Yemen attack plans on an unsecure group chat, a White House official confirmed.
